ygData.subject: Talies still wandering
ygData.msgSnippet: /Snip You know - I really have no clue why I keep maintaining this stuff - I did quit EQ after all ;) Talies the Wanderer /Endsnip Talies, You can take the
ygData.messageBody:
/Snip

You know - I really have no clue why I keep maintaining this stuff - I did
quit EQ after all ;)

Talies the Wanderer

/Endsnip

Talies,

You can take the bard out of EQ, but you can't take EQ out of the bard. Or
something like that = :). Personally, I enjoy seeing your continued
comments on messages that come across this list. Whether you still play or
not, you do have good knowledge to impart to us. This list is still the
most active of all the eGroups list I subscribe to. You and all the folks
that subscribe here make it that way and are great.

On a different note, I was at The Concert Hall today and saw a note to check
the Safehouse for some info. I did and their Library(guide) section is
excellent. Here is the link:

http://pub13.ezboard.com/bthesafehouse

Good singing to you all,

Piemur Draggonsinger
Bard of 37, oops, now 38 Songs (Dinged last night - Yay!)
Officer of The Unity of Spirits
The Nameless

PS - Did you get the commands updated today? I want to print them out...
Thanks.

Message: 25
Date: Thu, 16 Nov 2000 13:28:59 -0600
From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
Subject: Re: command list?

At 11:03 AM 11/16/00 -0800, you wrote:
> >Shameless plug:
> >
> >The EQ Commands page:
> >http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/everquest/eqcommands.htm
> >
> >Enjoy!
> >Talies
>
>Nice. Was there a reason the following were omitted or did I just miss it?
>
>/cast #
>/sit (on/off)
>/pause
>
>Also, it would be nice if they were separated into different sections by
>type, but heck, it's a great list anyway!


I actually had those in the "buffer" waiting to be added - but I haven't
made changes since September. I'm working on it now, though - so by the
end of the day, they should be accurate. In fact, if you ever find an error
or a new command, please don't hesitate to email
me.

You know - I really have no clue why I keep maintaining this stuff - I did
quit EQ after all ;)

Talies the Wanderer
